{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Waterlase system is a dental laser system. It uses a specific type of laser that is designed to interact with water and tissue in a unique way. This laser is not an Argon laser, Diode Laser, or Nd:YAG laser. The Waterlase system uses an Erbium, Chromium: Yttrium-Scandium-Gallium-Garnet (Er,Cr:YSGG) laser.", "answer_choice": "D. YSGG Laser"}
